title: Rajma Chawal Combo
description: A classic North Indian dish of red kidney beans in a spiced tomato gravy, served with basmati rice.

title: Handi Paneer+Rumali Roti
description: Creamy paneer cooked in a handi-style gravy, served with soft rumali roti.

title: Dal Makhani+Rumali Roti
description: Creamy black lentils cooked with spices, served with soft rumali roti.

title: Malai Kofta + Rumali Roti
description: Delicious kofta balls in a rich, creamy gravy, served with soft rumali roti.
